itunes:title: JUL 6, 2022 - DUTCH FARMERS BRING TANK TO FERTILIZER PROTEST; COPS SHOOT TRACTOR
title: JUL 6, 2022 - DUTCH FARMERS BRING TANK TO FERTILIZER PROTEST; COPS SHOOT TRACTOR
description:
Dutch farmers in the Netherlands respond to a green bill that targets fertilizer and furthers the Great Reset by bringing a tank to the protests; police fire targeted shots at tractors. Illinois is a ‘Red Flag’ state; however, Robert Crimo - the suspect of the July Fourth Highland Park parade massacre - was still able to purchase firearms even though he was under 21-years-old, had previously attempted suicide, and was known to the cops as a ‘clear and present danger’ after threatening to kill everyone in his family. TikTok star Hailee Lautenbach and her family were attacked by Antifa in Portland, Oregon on the Fourth of July. Finally, Poso analyzes the breakdown of law and order as a result of the ‘Defund the Police’ movement which has left police powerless. 




Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
